forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly clear, with a low around 60. West wind around 14 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of quiet drizzles is still clinging to the remnants of night. The air is soft with moisture, tempered by the gentle west wind. The clouds that linger overhead promise only a fleeting kiss of drizzle before the sun breaks free, chasing the shadows away. By midday, the city will bask in golden rays, temperatures reaching a comfortable warmth that hints at early autumn, before settling back into the cool embrace of the evening.

The morning reveals hints of the defined clarity typical of the Bay Area, though pockets of fog whisper around the edges, particularly near the Golden Gate. The marine layer is retreating, a gentle reminder of the city’s unique climate. As you step outside, layering is advisable; a light jacket will serve well against the brisk morning wind, while comfortable attire will make the transition to the sunnier afternoon breezy. This day beckons one to stroll along the waterfront or explore the quiet charm of local cafes—ideal for sipping warm coffee while gazing across the shimmering water. For those searching for a respite, a visit to one of San Francisco's many parks offers a blend of nature and tranquility, perfect for enjoying a book or simply soaking in the urban landscape.
